items.sentence: Boston is one of the most interesting cities I\'ve ever visited.
Did Tom say anything at all about why he didn\'t arrive on time?
Would you mind if I took off my shirt? It\'s really hot in here.
You\'ll get into trouble if your girlfriend finds out the truth.
Always wash new towels before you use them to remove the sizing.
Can you imagine what our life would be like without electricity?
You aren\'t really going to go to Boston in Tom\'s car, are you?
Tom is three years older than I am, but he\'s shorter than I am.
When did you find out that Tom didn\'t have a driver\'s license?
Why didn\'t you just tell me that you weren\'t planning to come?
Why didn\'t you tell Tom you couldn\'t do that without his help?
Tom probably won\'t be able to cope with the problem by himself.
Tom wouldn\'t even talk to Mary after she had apologized to him.
Tom and Mary told me that they\'re thinking about getting a dog.
Don\'t tell Tom that Mary isn\'t planning on helping his mother.
I ate something earlier this evening that didn\'t agree with me.
Mary has a huge crush on Tom, but she\'s too shy to talk to him.
Never ask a question if you aren\'t prepared to hear the answer.
My mother has a driver\'s license, but she doesn\'t drive a car.
If anybody had asked me if I were married, I\'d have said I was.
